title: Best of The Herd: 04/02/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 04/02/2019
description:
Doug Gottlieb fills in for Colin and points out that the Steelers have gotten rid of all their noisy players while the Browns have made as much noise as possible.  He thinks the Raiders are manipulating the media perfectly while the Cardinals are doing a terrible job.  Plus, FS1 NBA Analyst Chris Broussard tells Doug why his dream scenario is Kevin Durant leaving the Warriors for the Knicks.  Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
